languages.text: {n}Кассия поднимает на вас полный печали взгляд.{/n} "Думаете... мы не в силах искупить грехи наших предков?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия поднимает на вас полный печали взгляд.{/n} "Думаете... мы не в силах искупить грехи наших предков?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия поднимает на вас полный печали взгляд.{/n} "Думаете... мы не в силах искупить грехи наших предков?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは悲しみに満ちた目であなたを見上げる。{/n}「では、{name}様は…かつてのオーセリオ家の者どもによる過ちを、我々では埋め合わせできないとお考えですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは悲しみに満ちた目であなたを見上げる。{/n}「では、{name}様は…かつてのオーセリオ家の者どもによる過ちを、我々では埋め合わせできないとお考えですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅抬起头，看着你，眼中充满悲伤。{/n}“所以你觉得……我们没办法弥补前人犯下的过错吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅抬起头，看着你，眼中充满悲伤。{/n}“所以你觉得……我们没办法弥补前人犯下的罪孽吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia lève vers vous des yeux débordant de tristesse.{/n} « Vous... ne pensez pas qu'il est possible de racheter les fautes de ceux qui nous ont précédés ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia lève vers vous des yeux débordant de tristesse.{/n} « Vous... ne pensez pas qu'il est possible de racheter les péchés de ceux qui nous ont précédés ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia alza la mirada hacia ti con una gran tristeza en los ojos.{/n} «Entonces... ¿no cree que podamos resarcir los errores de nuestros antecesores?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia alza la mirada hacia ti con una gran tristeza en los ojos.{/n} «Entonces... ¿no cree que podamos resarcir los pecados de nuestros antecesores?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt mit traurigen Augen zu dir auf.{/n} "Ihr ... glaubt also nicht, dass wir die Fehler unserer Vorgänger wiedergutmachen können?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt mit traurigen Augen zu dir auf.{/n} "Ihr ... glaubt also nicht, dass wir die sündigen Taten unserer Vorgänger wiedergutmachen können?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, gözlerinde hüzünle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Yani... Atalarımızın günahlarını telafi edebileceğimize inanmıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks up at you with sorrow in her eyes.{/n} "So you... don't believe that we can make up for the faults of those who came before us?"
